tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE material_costs (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(50),
    unit_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    quantity INT,
    total_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE printing_operations (
  operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  operation_name VARCHAR(255),
  material_used INT,
  expense_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_used) REFERENCES material_costs(material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (expense_id) REFERENCES expenses(expense_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaterialCosts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name TEXT,
    cost_per_unit DECIMAL,
    quantity_purchased INT,
    total_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Expenses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    expense_id INT,
    expense_name TEXT,
    expense_description TEXT,
    amount_spent DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE PrintingJobs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_id INT,
    job_name TEXT,
    material_used TEXT,
    job_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Printers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    printer_id INT,
    printer_name TEXT,
    printer_type TEXT,
    printer_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE printing_jobs (
  job_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  job_name VARCHAR(50),
  material_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES material_costs(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE job_history (
  job_id INT,
  printer_id INT,
  start_date DATETIME,
  end_date DATETIME,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (job_id) REFERENCES printing_jobs(job_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (printer_id) REFERENCES printers(printer_id)
);
